# currentItem

**Instance Property**

The current element of the search.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var currentItem: UIAccessibilityCustomRotorItemResult { get set }
```

## Configuring search parameters

- **searchDirection**: The direction in which to search.
- **UIAccessibilityCustomRotor.Direction**: Constants that indicate the search direction.
